(Simplified: 鹂)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 麗 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 麗 [ lì ] beautiful, elegant, magnificent
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(黃鸝)鳥，羽毛黃色，從眼邊到頭後部有黑色斑紋，嘴淡紅色。鳴聲動聽悅耳。亦稱“黃鶯”、“倉庚”、“黃鳥”。
(Simplified: 鹂)

lí

鸝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》回支切，平支，來。］
“鹂1”的繁体字。
即黄鹂。

鸝字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸝； 康熙笔画：30； 页码：页1504第44
【廣韻】呂支切【集韻】鄰知切【韻會】離知切，?音離。黃鸝，倉庚也。一名黃鶯。郭璞云：其色黧黑而黃，因名之。陸璣云：黃鸝留，關西謂之鸝黃。俗呼黃離留，或謂之黃栗留。齊人謂之搏黍，常以葚熟時來桑閒。里語曰：黃栗留，看我麥，桑葚熟。亦應節趨時之鳥。又【集韻】鄰題切【韻會】憐題切【正韻】鄰溪切，?音黎。義同。互詳鶊鵹二字註。

Oriole
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹂; Kangxi strokes: 30; Page number: page 1504 44
[Guangyun] Lv Zhiqie [Jiyun] Neighbor Zhiqie [Yunhui] Li Zhiqie,? Yin Li. Oriole, Cang Geng also. A yellow warbler. Guo Puyun: Its color is black and yellow because of its name. Lu Jiyun: The yellow oriole stays, and Guanxi is called the yellow oriole. It is commonly called Huang Liliu, or Huang Liliu. The people of Qi said that they would like to fight for fun, and they often come to sangxian when they are familiar. The middle language says: Huang Liliu, look at my wheat and ripe mulberries. It should also be the bird of time. Also [Jiyun] Neighboring Questions [Rhyme] Pity Questions [Zheng Yun] Neighboring Rivers,? Yin Li. The same meaning. Detailed notes on the two characters 鶊鵹.
